welcome_back: Welcome back! Please enter your credentials.
start_analyzing: Sign up to start analyzing your legal contracts.
original_language_hint: The original language of the contract document.
output_language_hint: The language in which the analysis results will be provided.
drag_drop_hint: Drag and drop your contract file here
file_retention_policy_single_use: For single-use purchases, your uploaded contracts and their analysis results will be automatically deleted after 30 days.
file_retention_policy_subscription: For active subscription plans, your data will be retained for the duration of your subscription plus a 30 day grace period.
file_retention_policy_limit: The maximum number of files you can store at any given time is {{maxFiles}} for '{{planName}}'. To add more files after reaching your limit, please delete old files from your Contracts page.
file_limit_reached: You have reached your file storage limit of {{maxFiles}} files. To add more files, please delete old files from your Contracts page.
no_credit_or_subscription: You do not have an available single-use credit or a subscription plan. Please purchase one from the Pricing page to start uploading and analyzing contracts.
update_payment_methods: Update payment methods, view invoices, and manage your subscription
get_copy_invoice: Get a copy of your most recent billing statement
no_active_subscription: You don't have an active subscription.
subscription_will_cancel: Your subscription will be cancelled at the end of the current billing period.
account_protected: Your account is protected with two-factor authentication
add_extra_security: Add an extra layer of security to your account
default_jurisdictions_hint: Select the jurisdictions that will be pre-selected when uploading new contracts.
auto_start_analysis_hint: Automatically begin analysis when contracts are uploaded
email_reports_hint: Send completed analysis reports to your email
note_email_reports_setting: Note: The "Email Reports" setting is managed under "Preferences" for overall email report delivery. You would need to enable it if you prefer to receive Email Reports.
upload_to_get_started: Upload a contract to get started
upgrade_to_see_analytics: These reports are based on sample data. Upgrade to see analytics for your own contracts!
upload_a_contract_to_see_reports: Upload a contract to see your reports!
view_edit_delete_users: View, edit, and delete user accounts.
oversee_contracts_analysis: Oversee all uploaded contracts and analysis results.
view_messages_contact_form: View messages submitted through the contact form.
no_stripe_customer_id: User has no associated Stripe customer ID.
no_analysis_results_available: No analysis results available for this contract yet.
only_owner_invite: Only the subscription owner can invite new members.
max_users_reached: You have reached the maximum number of users ({{maxUsers}}) for your plan.
view_plans_to_add_members: You do not have an active subscription that supports multiple users.
choose_best_plan: Choose the plan that best fits your needs
already_covered_by_subscription: Already covered by your active subscription.
no_payment_needed_admin_assigned: No payment needed with your current assigned subscription.
only_owner_manage_downgrades: Only the subscription owner can manage downgrades.
only_owner_upgrade_enterprise: Only the subscription owner can upgrade to Enterprise Use.
sample_data_view_dashboard: This dashboard shows sample analysis results. Upgrade to analyze your own contracts!
upgrade_to_analyze_own_contracts: Upgrade to Analyze Your Own Contracts
select_sample_contract_to_view: Select a completed sample contract from the list to view its analysis.
session_ended: Your session has ended. Please log in again.
auth_failed_no_session: Authentication failed or no active session. Please sign up or try again.
email_not_confirmed: Email not confirmed. Please check your email for a confirmation link.
payment_cancelled_message: Your payment was cancelled. No charges were made to your account. You will be redirected to the upload page shortly.
payment_successful_message: Thank you for your purchase. Your payment has been processed successfully. You will be redirected to the upload page shortly.
enter_6_digit_code: Please enter the 6-digit code from your authenticator app.
mfa_factor_not_found: MFA factor not found. Please try logging in again.
problem_fetching_data: There was a problem fetching your data. This might be due to a temporary issue or a configuration problem.
check_supabase_rls: Please check your Supabase RLS policies and database logs for more details.
contract_being_analyzed: {{contractName}} is being analyzed and will be ready shortly.
may_take_minutes: This may take a few minutes depending on contract size.
link_expired_invalid: Failed to load report. The link may have expired or is invalid.
unexpected_error_occurred: We're sorry, but an unexpected error occurred. Please try refreshing the page.
enter_email_reset_instructions: Enter your email to receive reset instructions.
password_reset_email_sent: Password reset email sent! Please check your inbox. The link will direct you to update your password.
failed_to_send_password_reset: Failed to send password reset email.
password_must_be_6_chars: Password must be at least 6 characters long
password_reset_success: Password successfully reset! Redirecting to login...
enter_password_totp_to_confirm: Please enter your current password and a TOTP code from your authenticator app to confirm your identity before disabling two-factor authentication.
help_unavailable_during_reset: Help features are temporarily unavailable during password reset process. Please complete your password reset first.
click_here_report_issue: Click Here To Report An Issue
dashboard_overview_desc: The Dashboard provides a quick overview of your contracts and analysis results. On the left, you'll find a list of all your uploaded contracts. You can click on any completed contract to view its detailed analysis.
analysis_results_desc: Once a contract analysis is complete, the main section of the dashboard will display:
executive_summary_desc: A high-level overview of the contract's key findings and compliance score.
compliance_score_desc: An overall rating (0-100%) of the contract's adherence to legal standards.
findings_desc: Detailed breakdown of identified risks, compliance issues, data protection impacts, and enforceability concerns. Each finding includes a risk level, jurisdiction, category, and recommendations.
jurisdiction_summaries_desc: Specific insights and applicable laws relevant to each jurisdiction mentioned in the contract.
further_questions_contact_support: If you have further questions or encounter any issues, please use the "Report an Issue" button above to create a support ticket, or visit our full {{helpCenterLink}} for more detailed guides and FAQs.
your_message_sent: Your message has been sent successfully! We will get back to you soon.
your_ticket_submitted: Your support ticket has been submitted successfully! We will get back to you soon.
subject: Subject
otp_sent_to_email: OTP sent to your email. Please check your inbox.
email_sent_message: A confirmation link has been sent to {{email}}. Please click the link in the email to verify your account and proceed to the dashboard.
another_email_sent: Another confirmation email has been sent!
go_back_signup_valid_email: Please go back to signup and provide a valid email.
page_no_longer_used: This page is no longer used for email confirmation. If you were expecting to confirm your email, please ensure you clicked the link from your email. The application now uses a different callback mechanism.
user_has_no_stripe_customer_id: User has no associated Stripe customer ID.
max_users_reached_form: You have reached the maximum number of users ({{maxUsers}}) for your plan.
no_members_found_form: No members found for this subscription yet.
only_owner_invite_form: Only the subscription owner can invite new members.
view_plans_to_add_members_form: You do not have an active subscription that supports multiple users.
scan_qr_desc: Scan the QR code below with your authenticator app (e.g., Google Authenticator, Authy). Alternatively, you can manually enter the secret key.
enter_6_digit_code_app: Enter the 6-digit code from your authenticator app.
recovery_codes_desc: These are one-time use codes to access your account if you lose your authenticator device. **Save them in a safe place!** They will not be shown again.
enter_password_totp_to_confirm_modal: Please enter your current password and a TOTP code from your authenticator app to confirm your identity before disabling two-factor authentication.
help_unavailable_during_reset_modal: Help features are temporarily unavailable during password reset process. Please complete your password reset first.
dashboard_overview_desc_modal: The Dashboard provides a quick overview of your contracts and analysis results. On the left, you'll find a list of all your uploaded contracts. You can click on any completed contract to view its detailed analysis.
analysis_results_desc_modal: Once a contract analysis is complete, the main section of the dashboard will display:
executive_summary_desc_modal: A high-level overview of the contract's key findings and compliance score.
compliance_score_desc_modal: An overall rating (0-100%) of the contract's adherence to legal standards.
findings_desc_modal: Detailed breakdown of identified risks, compliance issues, data protection impacts, and enforceability concerns. Each finding includes a risk level, jurisdiction, category, and recommendations.
jurisdiction_summaries_desc_modal: Specific insights and applicable laws relevant to each jurisdiction mentioned in the contract.
further_questions_contact_support_modal: If you have further questions or encounter any issues, please use the "Report an Issue" button above to create a support ticket, or visit our full {{helpCenterLink}} for more detailed guides and FAQs.
no_analysis_results_available_modal: No analysis results available for this contract yet.
footer_disclaimer_info: This report is for informational purposes only and does not constitute legal advice.
choose_best_plan_landing: Choose the plan that best fits your needs
no_contract_no_obligation_desc: You're in control. Our service is month-to-month, with no hidden fees or long-term commitments.
upgrade_downgrade_cancel: Upgrade, downgrade, or cancel your subscription anytime, directly from your dashboard.
pay_as_you_go_option_desc: Need a single analysis? Our one-time purchase option is perfect for occasional use.
get_full_detailed_analysis: Get a full, detailed analysis report without a recurring subscription.
scalable_subscriptions_desc: For regular users, our Professional and Enterprise plans offer comprehensive features.
benefit_from_unlimited_access: Benefit from multi-user unlimited access, higher analysis limits, and priority support.
upgrade_to_analyze_own_contracts_sidebar: This dashboard shows sample analysis results. Upgrade to analyze your own contracts!
select_sample_contract_to_view_sidebar: Select a sample contract to view its analysis.
select_sample_contract_to_view_analysis: Select a sample contract to view its analysis
select_completed_sample_contract_to_view: Select a completed sample contract from the list to view its analysis.
